void cowichan_tbb::hull_split ( PointVector  pointsIn,
index_t  n,
PointVector  pointsOut,
index_t *  hn,
Point *  p1,
Point *  p2 
)

Recursive step of the quickhull algorithm - compute hull on one side of the splitting line.

Parameters:
pointsIn input points.
n number of inputs points to use.
pointsOut output points.
hn number of output points generated so far.
p1 first point of the splitting line (p1,p2).
p2 second point of the splitting line (p1,p2).
